attributes.action: encourage peer support schemes for young people with ASD in mainstream secondary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Prime Minister and his Government should encourage the use of Peer Support Schemes for young people with ASD in mainstream schools so that understanding between mainstream school pupils and those with ASD can be improved and that discrimination can be reduced. It would also help raise awareness amongst mainstream school pupils about ASD and what it is like to have it. It  would would also help young people with ASD develop their social and communication skills.
